WRITING.TITLE: [Academic] Video games survey for master thesis (All welcome)

WRITING.TEXT: good points, thank you very much
Will never forget when I lost with the 8 hp remaining on enemy tower. I was 11-2 in a challenge and I shouted so loud that my neighbor came to check up on me.

WRITING.TITLE: [Repost][Academic] User interface design (Everyone)
WRITING.TEXT: Hello everyone! I am a master of interaction design student. we are looking for information about the ways that we can improve the design of user interface for the pages that we designed for an application for our studies. I would really appreciate if you could go through all of the links. it is very easy and won't take much of your time. I am happy to do your surveys in exchange, just let me know :) **Each test can be done in less than a minute** 1.
